page.title: 18Community Groups in Llanelli
page.content: Llanelli has a thriving community spirit and active social life.All the usual groups are present.Soroptomists, Round Table,W.I.,Rotary,Masons and W.E.A.who have been here for seventy five years.Less common is the Family History Society who meet monthly to compile family trees and lecture on how to obtain such information.The Astronomical Society are getting very excited about the arrival of Halley's Comet. There are Chrysanthemum, Geranium and Rose Societies,who hold their colourful exhibitions annually. The Sports Clubs play their part in the Community by organizing Charity Events,as well as the entertainment they offer.Each of the different areas in our block have a Carnival during the Summer and this helps foster the community spirit throughout the block.
